option.name: PARAMETERS
option.value: "file://$PROJECT_DIR$/../bigdata-docker-compose/data/grades.csv" "file://$PROJECT_DIR$/../bigdata-docker-compose/data/ssn-address.tsv" -file1_sep=, -file1_header=true -file1_schema="`Last name` STRING, `First name` STRING, SSN STRING, Test1 INT, Test2 INT, Test3 INT, Test4 INT, Final INT, Grade STRING" -file1_join_column=SSN -file2_header=false -file2_schema="`Last name` STRING, `First name` STRING, SSN STRING, Address1 STRING, Address2 STRING" -file2_join_column=SSN -output_header=true -output_columns="file1.`Last name`, file1.`First name`, file1.SSN, file2.Address1, file2.Address2"
